alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:35PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Ada, southwestern Boise and south central Gem Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 335 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Boise, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Boise around 340 PM MDT. Garden City around 350 PM MDT. Aldape Summit around 400 PM MDT. Eagle, Hidden Springs and Bogus Basin Ski Area around 410 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
